DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : New diagnostic procedure , glycan analysis , may effective find ovarian epithelial cancer . PURPOSE : This clinical trial study well glycan analysis work diagnose cancer woman ovarian epithelial cancer healthy female participant .
DOC.brief_title: Glycan Analysis Diagnosing Cancer Women With Ovarian Epithelial Cancer Healthy Female Participants
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Evaluate accuracy glycan analysis distinguish normal healthy control female subject ovarian epithelial cancer . Secondary - Compare new assay standard CA 125 diagnostic accuracy . OUTLINE : - Ovarian cancer patient : Blood sample obtain periodically 2 year . Patients undergo surgery blood sample draw surgery . Medical chart review periodically 3 year . - Healthy volunteer : One blood sample obtain . Volunteers also complete 1-page questionnaire . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 300 healthy female participant 400 patient accrue study .
DOC.criteria: Able understand consent document participation study Not pregnant Negative pregnancy test Participants must meet 1 follow criterion : Patients schedule ovarian surgery ovarian mass Healthy female volunteer active cancer history cancer
